ing: 4 slices ginger root, peeled, or more to taste
10 melissa leaves (lemon balm), or more to taste
1 drop liquid stevia, or to taste (optional)
des: "This is wonderfully refreshing and thirst-quenching homemade flavored water. Ideal and healthy alternative to bought soda drinks."
ins: Place cucumber, nectarine, lemon slices, lemon juice, lime slices, lime juice, ginger, and melissa leaves in a large pitcher; mash gently with a wooden spoon. Pour in water, stir, and refrigerate until flavors blend, 2 hours to overnight. Strain; serve over ice.
